subject: Football
Retirement
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Brett Favre told ESPN on Sunday that his return was “highly unlikely.” But as the Green Bay Packers learned two years ago, there is final, and there is Favre.
snippet: Brett Favre told ESPN on Sunday that his return was “highly unlikely.” But as the Green Bay Packers learned two years ago, there is final, and there is Favre.
